cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence

Class BotContextualLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.GridSystem
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.InfluenceLayer
        • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.BotContextualLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyThreatsLayer, FarmingLayer, FriendlyThreatsLayer

    public abstract class BotContextualLayer
extends InfluenceLayer
    If we are working with agent, most of it's influence layers will be moving with him and will represents his surroundings. For that reason we have created this class. It creates layer, that is dependent on hero's context.
    Author:
    kocur
